clinical_study.brief_title: A Trial to Evaluate Natural Orifice Transgastric Endoscopic Cholecystectomy With Laparoscopic Assistance
clinical_study.official_title: A Trial to Evaluate Natural Orifice Transgastric Endoscopic Cholecystectomy With Laparoscopic Assistance

brief_summary.textblock: The study will document being able to successfully perform transgastric cholecystectomy (laparoscopic visualization) using a small collection of study surgical tools.

clinical_study.why_stopped: Study Terminated - No enrollment, business decision.

primary_outcome.description: Day of surgery only - study complete at end of prodecure.

intervention.description: Articulating Hook Knife, Articulating Snare, Articulating Needle Knife Articulating Graspers, Articulating Biopsy Forceps, Steerable Flex Trocar with Rotary Access Needle, Flexible Bipolar Hemostasis Forceps, Flexible Maryland Dissector, and Tissue Apposition System.
